info.name: darkplotter
info.summary: This package is an educational tool to teach undergradute students in astronomy about the gravitational potential and corresponding velocity curve as a function of radius for the Milky Way galaxy. After using this tool, students should understand that some form of dark matter must exist in order to explain the obsered velocity curve of the Milky Way.
